## highlight() function

Highlight returns a syntax-highlighted string of text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function highlight(content: string, extension: string, theme?: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

content


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The source code content to highlight


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

extension


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The file extension (e.g., ".ts", ".go")


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

theme


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The syntax theme to use (default: "dracula")


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

Promise resolving to the highlighted content string
